Magically imbued with sentience, these items think and feel the same way characters do and should be treated as NPCs. 지능있는 아이템 have extra 능력 and sometimes extraordinary powers and special 목적. 아이템과 캐릭터 간의 갈등

ITEMS AGAINST CHARACTERS

When an item has an Ego of its own, it has a will of its own. The item is, of course, absolutely true to its 성향. If the character who possesses the item is not true to that 성향’s goals or the item’s special 목적, personality conflict—item against character—results. Similarly, any item with an Ego score of 20 or higher always considers itself superior to any character, and a personality conflict results if the possessor does not always agree with the item.

When a personality conflict occurs, the possessor must make a Will 내성 굴림 (DC = item’s Ego). If the possessor succeeds, she is dominant. If she fails, the item is dominant. Dominance lasts for one day or until a critical situation occurs (such as a major battle, a serious threat to either the item or the character, and so on). Should an item gain dominance, it resists the character’s desires and 요구 concessions such as any of the following.

• Removal of associates or items whose 성향 or personality is distasteful to the item.

• The character divesting herself of all other 마법 아이템 or items of a certain type.

• Obedience from the character so the item can direct where they go for its own 목적.

• Immediate seeking out and slaying of creatures hateful to the item.

• Magical protections and devices to protect the item from molestation when it is not in use.

• That the character carry the item with her on all occasions.

• That the character relinquish the item in favor of a more suitable possessor due to 성향 differences or conduct.

In extreme circumstances, the item can resort to even harsher measures, such as the following acts:

• Force its possessor into 전투.

• Refuse to strike opponents.

• Strike at its wielder or her associates.

• Force its possessor to surrender to an opponent.

• Cause itself to drop from the character’s grasp.

Naturally, such actions are unlikely when harmony reigns between the character’s and item’s 성향 or when their 목적 and personalities are well matched. Even so, an item might 소원 to have a 하급 character possess it in order to easily establish and maintain dominance over him, or a higher-레벨 possessor so as to better accomplish its goals.

All 마법 아이템 with personalities desire to play an important role in whatever activity is under way, particularly 전투. Such items are rivals of each other, even if they are of the same 성향. No intelligent item wants to share its wielder with others. An intelligent item is aware of the presence of any other intelligent item within 60 feet, and most 지능있는 아이템 try their best to 오도 or 주의산만 their host so that she ignores or destroys the rival. Of course, 성향 might change this sort of behavior.

Items with personalities are never totally controlled or silenced by the characters who possess them, even though they may never successfully control their possessors. They may be powerless to force their 요구 but remain undaunted and continue to air their 소원 and 요구.
